alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 15 at 1:03PM AKST until November 16 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Elevated water levels and large breaking waves will cause high surf. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Through 6 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Waves will wash to the top of the beach. Beach erosion will occur. Minor flooding of low lying areas along the coast is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong south winds developing today will continue into Wednesday. This will cause elevated sea levels and large waves, which will cause high surf. The worst conditions will be along south and west facing coasts.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
